subject: Photography
title: The Photographer's Responsibility
description: A quick win: understand The Photographer's Responsibility.

hook.text: A camera is power. You choose what to show and what to hide. That choice carries responsibility.

buildup.text: Every photograph is an editorial decision. Inclusion, exclusion, emphasis, and timing shape the viewer's understanding.

discovery.text: A photographer documenting poverty can create empathy or exploitation. The same subject, different responsibility.

twist.text: Even personal photography carries weight. Sharing a photo of someone without consent can harm them.

climax.text: The photographer's responsibility is to consider impact ‚Äî not just aesthetics. Every image affects someone.

punchline.text: Before you press the shutter, ask: who does this serve?

quiz.question: What responsibility does a photographer carry?
options: Considering the impact of their images on subjects and viewers
